subject: any one in Utah?
author: Robin Westover
full_text:
I am producing a ghost hunting series in Utah and the surrounding 
states.
I am looking for some one who wants to explain the EVP-ITC Idea to my 
group and I,  to possibly feature on the ghost hunting series.

So if there is anyone in the Utah area that would like to come show us 
this proccess that would be great let me know.

robin@...

thanks
